SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( SET ERRORS=%ERRORLEVEL% ) IF %ERRORS% EQU 0 ( :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ) ELSE ( :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR ) @set retcode=%ERRORS% @if NOT %ERRORS% == 0 goto :retcode
:CASE "UNIX" execcode=$? if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then errors=$execcode fi if [ $errors -eq 0 ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO else : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR fi if [ "$errors" -ne "0" ] then exit $errors fi :OTHER :ENDSWITCH
